item.description:
Friday night out! Come join me at the outdoor patio!

Went to see Chuck at this location not too long ago and it's a great spot! Just beyond the Boston Bowl that you can see from the highway. We can sit back, enjoy some apps and drinks and I know two of us will dance, so hopefully more will join!


FRIDAY NIGHT! Chuck Palmer will be playing live outside on the patio at the Phillips Old Colony House on Morrissey Blvd in Dorchester from 7 to 11 on FRIDAY NIGHT! (6 to 9PM inside if it rains).

Bring cash for any food and beverages you might order.

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Friday night drinks/apps and music!
